channel.title: SwiftUI on Mahi Garg
channel.description: Recent content in SwiftUI on Mahi Garg

item.title: Fidget Loader : SwiftUI
item.description: The Fidget Loader is a dynamic and visually engaging iOS component built using SwiftUI, designed to enhance user experience by providing elegant loading animations within any iOS application.

item.title: Lazy Loader : SwiftUI
item.description: The Lazy Loader is a dynamic and visually engaging iOS component built using SwiftUI, designed to enhance user experience by providing elegant loading animations within any iOS application.

item.title: Arc Progress Loader : SwiftUI
item.description: The Arc Progress Loader is a dynamic and visually engaging iOS component built using SwiftUI, designed to enhance user experience by providing elegant loading animations within any iOS application.

item.title: Four Sided Fidget Loader: SwiftUI
item.description: The Four Sided Fidget Loader is a dynamic and visually engaging iOS component built using SwiftUI, designed to enhance user experience by providing elegant loading animations within any iOS application.

item.title: Ripple Loader : SwiftUI
item.description: The Ripple Loader is a dynamic and visually engaging iOS component built using SwiftUI, designed to enhance user experience by providing elegant loading animations within any iOS application.

item.title: Ring and Circle Loader : SwiftUI
item.description: The Ring and Circle Loader is a dynamic and visually engaging iOS component built using SwiftUI, designed to enhance user experience by providing elegant loading animations within any iOS application.

item.description: The Rotating Circular Sticks Loader is a dynamic and visually engaging iOS component built using SwiftUI, designed to enhance user experience by providing elegant loading animations within any iOS application.

item.title: Rotating Square Loader : SwiftUI
item.description: The Rotating Square Loader is a dynamic and visually engaging iOS component built using SwiftUI, designed to enhance user experience by providing elegant loading animations within any iOS application.

item.title: CoreData in SwiftUI
item.description: Merge data management seamlessly with UI. Model, persist, and update app data effortlessly using declarative syntax. Fetch, sort, and filter data effortlessly, ensuring a responsive and engaging user experience.

item.title: Carousel View : SwiftUI
item.description: A carousel view is a user interface component commonly used in mobile and web applications to display a collection of items in a horizontally scrolling manner.

item.title: Instagram Post : SwiftUI
item.description: Coding an Instagram post in SwiftUI is an engaging project. You can use various components like images, text, and buttons to design a post layout.

item.title: Instagarm Logo : SwiftUI
item.description: Creating the Instagram logo in SwiftUI is an exciting task. Using basic shapes like circles, squares, and colors, you can piece together the iconic camera symbol and colorful gradient background.

item.title: List: SwiftUI
item.description: In SwiftUI, the List is a powerful tool for creating neat and organized scrolling lists in apps. Imagine it as a virtual scrollable sheet of paper where you can display various items, like names, messages, or to-do tasks.

item.title: NavigationView in SwiftUI
item.description: Navigation involves moving between different screens or views within an app. SwiftUI provides a navigation view hierarchy that allows users to navigate between different views seamlessly.

item.title: @State: SwiftUI
item.description: In SwiftUI, a powerful framework for building user interfaces, managing and updating the state of our views is essential for creating dynamic and interactive user experiences.
